name: Synthetic Aperture Radar: Hazards

name: Reservoir Geomechanics

name: Forest Monitoring with CLASlite
desciption: Welcome to the world’s first online course for deforestation and forest degradation mapping. This course is designed to equip users with the knowledge needed to monitor forests using the Carnegie Landsat Analysis System-lite or CLASlite. The course provides the scientific basis for each module in CLASlite, along with other information to make forest monitoring easy using Earth observing satellite data. For more information, visit the CLASlite website:
certificate: Access to course at no cost
